functionDecorators.name: setLiquidationFees
functionDecorators.description: Only manager is able to call this function. Sets the percentages of the liquidation fee for provided collaterals.

parameterDecorators.name: assets
parameterDecorators.description: The array of addresses of the main collateral tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: newValues
parameterDecorators.description: The array of liquidation fee percentages (0 decimals)*.

functionDecorators.name: setManagers
functionDecorators.description: Only manager is able to call this function. Grants and revokes manager's status.

functionDecorators.name: setOracleTypes
functionDecorators.description: Only manager is able to call this function. Enables/disables oracle types.

parameterDecorators.name: _types
parameterDecorators.description: The array of types of the oracles.

parameterDecorators.name: assets
parameterDecorators.description: The array of addresses of the main collateral tokens.

functionDecorators.name: setStabilityFees
functionDecorators.description: Only manager is able to call this function. Sets the percentage of the year stability fee for a particular collateral.

parameterDecorators.name: assets
parameterDecorators.description: The array of addresses of the main collateral tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: newValues
parameterDecorators.description: The array of stability fee percentages (3 decimals)*.

functionDecorators.name: setTokenDebtLimits
functionDecorators.description: Only manager is able to call this function. Sets USDP limits for a provided collaterals.

parameterDecorators.name: assets
parameterDecorators.description: The addresses of the main collateral tokens.

functionDecorators.name: setVaultAccesses
functionDecorators.description: Only manager is able to call this function. Sets a permission for provided addresses to modify the Vault.
